short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates distances from selected locations to a default target location, like a workplace or nearby restaurant.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How Far is a Chrome extension that calculates distances between a selected location and a set target location. Ideal for planning routes or estimating travel time to frequently visited places like workplaces, restaurants, or homes. The extension integrates with maps and provides straightforward distance calculations right from your browser, helping you save time and navigate smarter.

Key Features:

Easily set and save a target location, such as your workplace or home.
Quickly calculate distances from selected points on web pages to your target location.
User-friendly interface and toggleable light/dark mode.
No extra logins or subscriptions required.
Supports multiple location scenarios, whether youâ€™re comparing hotels, restaurants, or other destinations.
Perfect for professionals, travelers, and anyone who needs quick access to travel information right from their browser.
